2.3 - MSB, LV Distribution Boards, and Control Panels
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm the following items are constructed in accordance with IFC design and specification.
Verify and confirm the following tests (not limited to):
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005, AS/NZS 3000, Drawings 030-3100 set
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed, Building Engineering ITP
2.4 - Cable Tray & Cable Tray Support Post Installation (Comms, Electrical and AGL)
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm the following items are constructed in accordance with IFC design and specification.
○ (i) Provide cable support system throughout, including cable trays (both power and Comms/ELV), cable ladders, trunking, conduits and catenary wire system.

○ (ii) External ducts and draw pits for the incoming LV supply shall be provided by the Civils Trade. Ducts connected between building and external pits to be of flexible type and be able to withstand building movement.
○ (iii) Provide cast-in conduits with draw wires as required.

○ (iv) All safety services shall be installed on fire rated containment. Where fire rated cable share containment with general services reticulation, all containment and fixings shall be selected and installed to suit the requirements of the safety services installation.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005-C2100, C2112 AS/NZS 3000, Drawings 030-3100 set
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Building Eng ITC
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm cabling is constructed in accordance with IFC design and AS/NZS 3000.
Verify and confirm the following tests (not limited to):
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 C2111.5, AS/NZS 3000, Drawings 030-3100 set
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Building Eng ITP
2.6 - Emergency Lighting and Illuminated Exit Sign Installation
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm cabling is constructed in accordance with IFC design and AS/NZS 3000 & AS/NZS 2293
Verify and confirm the following tests (not limited to):
All Emergency luminaires, signs and exits labelled as per ALER 3 Emergency Lighting Schedule.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 C2132, Drawings 030-3100 set, AS/NZS 3000
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Building Eng ITP
2.7 - Light Fitting and Light Control Installation. (External/Internal Luminaires, PIRs)
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm the following items are constructed in accordance with IFC design and specification.
○ Verify and confirm the following tests (not limited to):
○ DALI control and lighting devices has been provided where dimming or time scheduling is required.

○ External lighting must meet spill requirements of Part 139 (Aerodromes) MOS 2019 (i.e. downward facing so no spill light above the horizontal) and must not cause glare or distraction to pilots during aircraft movements.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 C2133 C2130, Drawings 030-3100 set, AS/NZS 1680.3, AS/NZS 3000 MOS 2019 – Part 139
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Building Eng ITP
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm the following items are constructed in accordance with IFC design and specification.
Confirm mounting height of outlets on site with the Superintendent. Generally, and unless otherwise shown on the drawings, outlets shall be mounted at:
○ 300 mm above floor level or 200mm above benches in commercial areas.
○ 1400 mm above floor level in plant and industrial areas.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005- C2141, Drawings 030-3100 set, AS/NZS 3000, AS/ACIF S009:2006
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Building Eng ITP
2.9 - Access Control systems Installation (Security Panel, Card Readers, Mag locks, Reed switches, REX, UPS)
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm the following items are constructed in accordance with IFC design and specification.
○ Check that the card reader is installed:
a) at 1000mm above floor level; and
b) on the access side of the door, on the mullion or within 600mm of the door / egress area as applicable.
○ Verify battery and/or UPS capacity can operate normally for a duration of Eight (8) hours.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 C2701/C2703, Drawings 030-3100 set, AS/NZS 3000, AS/NZS 2293 AS/ACIF S009:2006
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Building Eng ITP
2.10 - CCTV Systems (CCTV Racks, CCTV Cameras, Archivers & Monitors)
Acceptance Criteria - Verify that CCTV rack installation quality are satisfactory as follows:
– Equipment layout per IFC layout drawing.
– Racks (internal and external surfaces) are clean and free from any drilling dust, cable tie or cable off cuts and other debris.
– Verify that all cables, patch cords, terminations and equipment are correctly labelled in accordance with the Cable Schedule, Patch Record and Label Schedules as well as the IFC Drawings.
○ Verify that all cameras and mounting brackets are installed as per the camera coverage plans and camera schedule.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 C2705, Drawings 030-3100 set, AS/NZS 3000 AS/ACIF S009:2006
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Building Eng ITP
Acceptance Criteria - The external lighting protection system shall be constructed as per AS/NZS 1768 and APAM standards
○ Structural steelwork, cable trunking, metallic cable support systems, metal equipment and pipework shall be bonded as required by the regulations, AS/NZS 3000.

○ Provide a main earth bar in the main switch room in a convenient location at 300 mm above finished floor level. Each bar shall be copper and be bonded to two local building earth plates using single core 70 mm2 green PVC sheathed stranded copper cable.
Reference Documents - ZULU-BECA- 001-SPC-00005 C2160 / C2161, Drawings 030-3100 set, AS/NZS 1768, APAM standards, AS/NZS 3000
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Building Eng ITP
